scripts.start: webpack serve --port 3000 --mode development --open --hot  --env mainColor='#8520d0' --env secondaryColor='#876cd0' --env name='Elipse Chat' --env description='Asistente Virtual' --env avatar='../../assets/user.svg' --env socketUrl='https://ws-ailalia.ngrok.io' --env restUrl='https://rest-ailalia.ngrok.io/v1/api/webchat/sendMessageToAgent'
scripts.build: webpack --mode production --env mainColor='#8520d0' --env secondaryColor='#876cd0' --env name='Elipse Chat' --env description='Asistente Virtual' --env avatar='assets/user.svg' --env socketUrl='https://ws-ailalia.ngrok.io' --env restUrl='https://rest-ailalia.ngrok.io/v1/api/webchat/sendMessageToAgent'
